text: Thomas More Barrett (born April 30, 1981) is an American politician who has been a member of the United States House of Representatives from since 2025. He was a member of the Michigan Senate for the 24th district from 2019 to 2023. Barrett was the Republican nominee in the 2022 election for Michigan's 7th congressional district, which he lost to incumbent Democrat Elissa Slotkin. He ran for the same seat again in 2024, this time beating Democratic nominee Curtis Hertel Jr. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Michigan Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Tom Barrett (Michigan politician)
